name: NOVOSTI
goal:
The goals of the “NOVOSTI” to stop and not to let a distribution of suspicious information, which make a distorted attitude regarding to events (news) among the Russian - speaking inhabitants in states of the European Union, creating a local electronic media in Russian;

- to refute suspicious news, using an analysis of information, a comparison of facts, using believable sources, revealing real facts and publishing it for free access;

- to raise level of awareness among the Russian-speaking inhabitants in the European Union regarding to events (news) in Russia, in the Ukraine, in states of the European Union and in the World, using a layout of an implicit believable events (news).
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, External Relations, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives: The main aim of organisation is ground on such EU legislative files as: European Parliament resolution of 23 November 2016 on EU strategic communication to counteract propaganda against it by third parties (2016/2030(INI))
